changeSet.createView: SELECT t.id,t.stock_out_task_code, p.stock_out_plan_code, t.stock_out_date, (SELECT COUNT(tb.id) FROM stock_out_req_frozen_tube tb WHERE tb.STOCK_OUT_TASK_ID = t.id and tb.status !='1303') as count_of_stock_out_sample , (SELECT COUNT(hd.id) FROM stock_out_handover_details hd LEFT JOIN stock_out_handover_box hb on hd.stock_out_handover_box_id=hb.id LEFT JOIN stock_out_handover h ON hb.stock_out_handover_id = h.id WHERE h.stock_out_task_id = t.id) as count_of_hand_over_sample, (SELECT COUNT(h.id) FROM stock_out_handover h WHERE h.stock_out_task_id = t.id and h.status='2102') as hand_over_times, ap.purpose_of_sample,t.status,d.delegate_name FROM stock_out_task t LEFT OUTER JOIN stock_out_plan p ON t.stock_out_plan_id = p.id LEFT OUTER JOIN stock_out_apply ap ON p.stock_out_apply_id = ap.id LEFT OUTER JOIN delegate d ON ap.delegate_id = d.id WHERE (SELECT COUNT(tb.id) FROM stock_out_req_frozen_tube tb WHERE tb.STOCK_OUT_TASK_ID = t.id and tb.status !='1303')>0
